description: This Java class is a REST controller named NoteController that exposes CRUD API endpoints for managing notes. It handles creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting notes via HTTP operations, delegating the core logic to a NoteService. The file makes extensive use of annotations for routing, validation, API documentation, and response status control.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing CRUD operations for notes, handling HTTP requests and delegating to NoteService.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note using information from NoteCreateRequest, returns a NoteResponse.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its UUID, returns a NoteResponse.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists notes with optional search query and pagination, returning a paged response of notes.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by UUID with data from NoteUpdateRequest.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its UUID.
